title: OAT - Offline Album Tidy
description: A privacy-first, browser-based face recognition tool designed to solve the 'privacy nightmare' of cloud AI. It processes thousands of photos locally to find specific people in large shared albums. It utilizes a hybrid architecture of face-api.js for detection and MobileFaceNet (ONNX) for generating 512-dim embeddings with cosine similarity matching.

title: Gyan-Path
description: An indoor navigation web app specifically for the GGITS campus. It uses custom Dijkstra algorithms and multilevel bidirectional graphs to help users find exam rooms and labs, reducing navigation time by 60%.

title: MediMate
description: An IoT-based smart medication dispenser for elderly and chronically ill patients. It features a 28-compartment circular hardware unit that automatically rotates to the correct dose, provides audio-visual alerts, and tracks adherence via a digital platform named MediProgress.

title: Airosphere
description: A MERN stack community platform built for the college branch, featuring Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). It provides academic resource management (notes, PYQs), a 'Student Connect' feature for finding teammates, and learning roadmaps with progress tracking.

title: VibeScript (Chitrapath)
description: A full-stack application that transforms PDF books into cinematic, multisensory storytelling experiences. It orchestrates parallel AI generation to create scene-specific visuals, synchronized voice narration with character-specific emotions, and adaptive background music, effectively acting as 'Netflix for Books'.

title: BareMetal (PolyScope)
description: The ultimate runtime visualizer; an interactive educational platform designed to show how programming languages work under the hood. It integrates the Godbolt Compiler Explorer API to visualize assembly output and memory management models for C++, Go, and Rust.

title: @anmol117/stacksmith
description: A CLI scaffolding tool for developers to jumpstart full-stack projects. It automates the creation of boilerplates for Frontend (React/Vite), Backend (Express), and Fullstack architectures, with 900+ downloads on npm.

title: LogKyaKahenge
description: A satirical AI-powered roasting platform. It analyzes digital footprints (GitHub, LeetCode, Reddit) and delivers brutal, personalized roasts in the voices of iconic Indian personas like 'Tana Shah' or 'Pinky Aunty'.

title: What-If
description: An interactive story generator that uses Gemini AI to turn hypothetical scenarios into Ghibli-style animated narratives. Features Indian-style humor and parallel image generation for high-speed performance.

title: BidGrid
description: An intelligent RFP (Request for Proposal) management platform. It automates the procurement workflow by parsing vendor responses from emails/PDFs and using AI to recommend the best vendor based on price, timeline, and terms.

title: DOM-O-RAMA
description: A visual Virtual DOM simulator. It allows developers to compare Framework strategies (React Fiber, Vue Patch, Svelte direct updates) side-by-side using interactive trees and head-to-head 'Framework Battles'.

title: PlanIt
description: An automated timetable generator for academic institutions. It utilizes a hybrid genetic algorithm (SOM/SCDS) to optimize 15+ hard and soft constraints, reducing conflicts by 40%.

title: Neuro Bots Club Site
description: The official web platform for the Neuro Bots Robotics Club at GGITS. It showcases the club's mission, team, and educational robotics simulators, officially acknowledged by the HOD and Principal.
